title: Similarity between Inca and Aztec societies

content.prompt: Inca and Aztec societies were similar in that both

choices.label: acquired empires by means of military conquest

topic.text: 1.7: Comparison in the Period from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
